Class Show

java.lang.Object
Show
public class Show extends Object
This class represents a show that the cinema is screening. A show is the screening of a given movie at a certain time.
Version:
2023.05.05
Author:
Max, Nathaniel, and Salvatore

      public boolean reserve(Theater theater, Row row, ArrayList<Seat> seats)
      Reserves seats.
      Parameters:
      theater - the theater that the customer will be seated in.
      row - the row that the customer will be seated in.
      seats - the seat(s) that the customer will be seated in.

    • xFreeSeats

      public ArrayList<Integer> xFreeSeats(Theater theater, int x)
      Checks the seating for this show in a particular theater for x adjoining seats.
      Parameters:
      theater - the theater being checked.
      x - the number of adjoining seats.
      Returns:
      the list of row numbers that contain x adjoining seats.
